short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take mindful breaks from distracting websites and regain your focus

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It helps users minimize distractions by implementing mindful website blocking and a 10-second pause before accessing time-consuming sites.

This is the first version and in the next I'll be integrating an accountability partner feature (where user can only open a website with a password sent to the accountability partner's email).
